entry.source: {F804,5}Pluto Castle{F804,0} is {F804,5}southeast from Shinjuku, near{F801}Kasumigaseki.{F804,0} {F804,5}You need to overthrow Pluto the{F801}Tormentor{F804,0} there. I used to be pretty hot at{F801}handling demons, but I don't have the strength{F801}to fight Pluto. I've got to trust in you{F801}Messiahs from another world.{F801}

entry.source: Burroughs' note:{F801} {F801}We've beaten Pluto the Tormentor, so let's go{F801}claim our prize. Master {F804,5}Akira{F804,0} in Shinjuku has{F801}it, right?{F801}
